Light green -Yi. Blue - miao.]] '''Xuyong County''' (Chinese: 叙永)) is a county of [[Sichuan|Sichuan Province]], [[China]]. It is under the administration of [[Luzhou]] city. *The county covers 2977 square kilometres with a population of 688,200 in 2007.[http://baike.baidu.com/view/399432.htm] ==See also== *[[Luzhou]] ==External links== *[http://www.xuyong.gov.cn/ Xuyong County Government website] {{County-level divisions of Sichuan}} [[Category:County-level divisions of Sichuan]] {{Sichuan-geo-stub}}
